Animation Demos

Often Overlooked Options

animate the <html>

animate pseudo-elements on the <html>
  • animations (and pseudo elements) can be applied to almost any target
  • including the tag
  • which means we can build simple full page animated backgrounds
  • or rediculously tedious ones
  • combine this with some CSS filters and you can do some really cool things

  • they make really nice enhancements to ajax loaded data
